reporter-output.line: Setting Environment to: PROD
Environment: PROD
Open url 'http://qa5dev.publisher.nbcuni.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Enter '748cade6eadc4bd' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Click the Cover Photo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Cast/Crew' link.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Contributor' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Director' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Executive Producer' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Host' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Judge' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Producer' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Self' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Song Writer' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Writer' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is not displayed.
Select the 'Character' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is displayed.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Cast/Crew' link.
Enter '54096b9c1c5449d' in the Person text box.
Click the '54096b9c1c5449d' from the auto complete option list.
Select the 'Character' from the 'Role' drop down list.
Enter '748cade6eadc4bd' in the 'Character' text box.
Click the '748cade6eadc4bd' from the auto complete option list.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Cast/Crew' link.
Assert that the 'Character' text box is displayed.
Assert the value of the 'Person' text box equals '54096b9c1c5449d'.
Assert the value of the 'Role' drop down list equals 'Character'.
Assert the value of the 'Character' text box equals '748cade6eadc4bd'.
